column5: hello all spring is here and boat is getting ready.i'm thinking of upgrading my finder.what is the flasher on a finder.any info would be great thanks jamie ps bubget is about 400.00 plus tax

hey Jamie   $400 you can get you a decent grey-scale Lowrance/Eagle or a small colour one  - what type of fishing are you mostly going to be doing?  Flasher - hard to tell what your reffering to, but there are some fishfinders that now include a flasher page as well ( same thing as what a Vexilar or Marcum does)
hey mark thanks for the info.have you been to the post office yey?lol
